revised_title: Experimental Researches on the Electric Discharge with the Chloride of Silver Battery: Part IV
tldr: This paper presents a series of experiments on the electric discharge with the chloride of silver battery, focusing on the effects of different tube shapes, dimensions, and gas compositions on the discharge's pressure, resistance, and stratification. The authors also investigate the differences in potential and resistance in vacuum tubes with various constructions and the influence of terminals on the discharge's passage.
